waffles.name: Classic Crispy Waffles
waffles.description: The secret to these super-crispy waffles is using a little vegetable shortening. Make a large batch on the weekend, then grab and reheat on a rushed morning.

waffles.name: Chicken and Waffles
waffles.description: A topping of fried chicken might be the only way to improve upon our classic, crispy waffles. Crunchy on the outside, our fried chicken gets its moist, tender insides from a buttermilk brine with hints of paprika, hot sauce and cayenne.

waffles.name: Thanksgiving Waffles
waffles.description: Giving thanks for these yummy Waffles! Cracking eggs onto a well-greased waffle iron will give you perfectly cooked, intact sunny-side up eggs, complete with crispy, lacy edges. Break the yolks for a gooey topping to these Gruyere-and-ham-laden waffles.

waffles.name: Buttermilk Corn Waffles
waffles.description: A summery combination of corn and berries makes these rich, crispy-edged waffles stand out. They would easily work as savory treats, too, topped with a crab cake or fried shrimp and drizzled with remoulade sauce.

waffles.name: Sweet Potato Waffles with Marshmallows
waffles.description: We topped dense, sweet potato waffles with mini marshmallows and maple syrup for a fun twist on the classic casserole.

waffles.name: Multigrain Waffles
waffles.description: These slightly nutty waffles are packed with three different grains. Top with yogurt and fruit preserves for a hearty, healthy start to your morning.

waffles.name: Pumpkin-Chipotle Waffles
waffles.description: We serve these sweet and spicy Southwestern-inspired waffles with an orange- and cayenne-infused maple syrup for a citrus kick.

waffles.name: Crisp and Airy Gluten-Free Waffles
waffles.description: Cracking eggs onto a well-greased waffle iron will give you perfectly cooked, intact sunny-side up eggs, complete with crispy, lacy edges. Break the yolks for a gooey topping to these Gruyere-and-ham-laden waffles.

waffles.name: Portuguese Sweet Bread Waffles
waffles.description: A Favorite in any Portuguese Vovoas' kitchen! Sweet, soft creamy sweet bread dough baked to perfection in an adorable heart-shaped waffle stack, and layered with whipped cream cheese, cinnamon and berries.
